cWarningAdditions: Content Warning: This poem is not for goodie-goodie three shoes.
poemContent: The test is over,the marking has begun,��"MISS MISS MISSSSCan I have one mark hereMISSPlease just one",The class is livid, everyone withtheir hands in their ears, sick oftheir retarded cry��,"You don't need any more FUCKINGmarks, you have grade 9."You're wasting time, It's just a mistake,You can't do this in your GCSEs,You're making us late, to break,and lunch, and life, and going home,So respectfully,Enjoy your grade,Control your emotions,Please, just ask after,It's just a number.It makes no difference,Do we care? ��NO!
